item.description:
If you love mushrooms and would like to sample a variety of recipes don't miss this dinner. We have 12-15 spots available for a mushroom potluck dinner at Olga's. If you are interested please email and tell me what favorite mushroom dish you'll bring (type of mushroom and preparation.). Please respond asap...first come, first eat!

When: Saturday, March 12
Time: 5pm
Where: Bedford, MA (Address will be sent to diners)
What to bring: Your favorite mushroom dish & drinks
item.why: Lady's and gentlemen, or fungi & fungils...do we have a treat for you.
item.name: Mushroom Dinner @ Olga's
